Articles.Content:
So, I’m minding my own buisness, plotting my burn to Eve, and then the Mün ruins it! But, instead of pressing, “skip orbit” I rearranged it to be a gravity boost not break, then held retrograde, and voíla! An Eve encounter, for an entire 30 less DeltaV! But, that 30 deltaV means (I think) I can crash my booster into Eve, and not leave it in an elliptical solar orbit.

(I say Mün because It makes the mün smile!)

Edited March 21, 2021 by Wizard Kerbal
Every moon has a silver lining.
